text: There is just a hope that we may uncover some weakness, and find a way of fighting back at them." Heather agreed, and suggested that they use Dan as a specimen demonstrating how the Thetan machinations had been working out. It occurred to Steve that this may not have been entirely an objective suggestion on her part; but he thought it a good idea nevertheless.
